name: Delivery! (Nikolas-Exists)
description:
Made for the Jame Gam Christmas Edition 2022

It's December 25th, at 2:30 in the morning. While delivering gifts, Santa gets stopped by a security guard, who says that Santa is trespassing and must leave at once. However, in his goal to spread joy throughout the world, Santa just couldn't do that. The problem is the house is laced with security personnel and traps meant to harm intruders. So would you like to help Santa get past the security?

GAME

Once you enter the house, you must block the spikes with your shield while paying attention to the numbers that are flashing at the top of your screen. Once you get to the guard, you must input the code to the beat of the music. Once the guard is knocked unconscious, you must go through the process multiple to get to the tree and spread joy to a new family!

CONTROLS

 "Shield facing up" and "Shield facing down" are both customizable in the Controls menu 

QShield facing upWShield facing down1, 2, 3For inputting the code INFO
  • Each difficulty has a different amount of guards to defeat
    • Easy - 3 guards
    • Medium - 6 guards
    • Hard - 12 guards
    • Endless - Go until you die!
  • In every game mode, you have three lives. Lives are lost by getting hit by a spike or missing a beat while fighting a guard
CREDITS Tools
  • Engine: Godot
  • Pixel art creation: Pixelorama
  • In-game music: Bosca Ceoil
Assets
  • Falling noise
  • Ground impact
  • Sleigh reference
  • Death SFX
  • Wind SFX
  • Home screen music
  • Pixeloid font
